Mechanic Simulator 2014.  Car Mechanic Simulator 2014 gives you the behind the
scenes view of the daily dealings at local garages and dealership repair shops.
Car Mechanic Simulator 2014 is a must have for auto mechanics and fans of the 
worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most popular autos!

                            KEY FEATURES

* Interact with car owners seeking repairs                                         

* Order parts and materials necessary to maintain inventory including used car 
 parts to help keep consumer costs low.

* Purchase repair manuals to enable you to work better, faster and earn more    income!

* Work on eight different car models including Town Cars, Compacts, Sedans,        
SUVs, Family Cars, SUVs VANs, and Limousines

* Gain experience with over 120 different repairs including brakes,
